headline: AG Warns Of Growing Police Shortages
author: Tyler Friel
sentences: She also said that more money could be an incentive to get more police officers, but any additional money needs to be approved by lawmakers in Harrisburg.
The Philadelphia police commissioner said that a combination of a rise in crime and staffing shortages has led to burnout.
Josh Shapiro was in Philadelphia yesterday and said that right now, there are more than 1,200 vacancies across the state.
The stateâ€™s attorney general says there is a growing shortage of police officers in Pennsylvania.
